TopicTitle: Need help w/ where to put all my toolbar files

Articles.Content: KSP is saying the "gamedata" folder can only have one "000_Toolbar" folder. I downloaded blizzy78's toolbar to host my FAR, Custom biomes, Engineer Redux, and Kerbal Alarm clock mods. Each one of these files has a "toolbar.dll" file, do I just simply take that file from each mod folder and place it in the "000_Toolbar" folder? I'm confused on how to properly install this. Thanks in advance for any help, it's much appreciated.

ok the toolbar.dll is in the 000_Toolbar

remove every other toolbar.dll and see if it works then.....\Gamedata\000_Toolbar there should be just one Toolbar.dll

Do I delete the toolbar.dll files from the Custom Biomes, and FAR folders, or do I leave them in there? I originally placed them in the 000_Toolbar folder, because when I booted up KSP, that's what it said to do. So do I put them back into the mod folders or delete them completely?
hmm i dont have custom biomes and far but as far as i can tell remove them (but do backup them just in case) and then try again

Ok, I deleted custom biomes entirely for the time being. I have deleted the FAR toolbar.dll file. The engineering redux toolbar.dll file is inside the KER folder, and the same thing for Kerbal Alarm Clock. This is what i'm getting right now:

Edit: How in the world do I insert this image......

Putting in screenshot
Sorry to jump in but yes all you need is 1 folder 000_Toolbar in KSP/GameData the rest delete it's like ModuleManager *.*.* you just need 1 but every mod thinks they have to put in there.

Ok, I deleted custom biomes entirely for the time being. I have deleted the FAR toolbar.dll file. The engineering redux toolbar.dll file is inside the KER folder, and the same thing for Kerbal Alarm Clock. you have probbaly deleted the icons too do not tuch those just the dll file!
Ok, i'm going to delete and reinstall FAR, Kerbal Alarm Clock, & Toolbar, brb

Leave there toolbar out of your install you don't need it there plugin looks for the toolbar plugin. and toolbar makes a backup in KSP/GameData <--folder toolbar-settings.dat.

Ok, i've installed everything back into my KSP application folder. Only have one 000_Toolbar folder in the KSP/GameData. In the FAR folder there is the toolbar.dll, and in the alarm clock folder there is the toolbar.dll file

Ok, i've installed everything back into my KSP application folder. Only have one 000_Toolbar folder in the KSP/GameData. In the FAR folder there is the toolbar.dll, and in the alarm clock folder there is the toolbar.dll file

delete far and alarm clock Toolbar.dll and only that nothing else
PERFECT, FAR & KAC mods are doing just fine in the toolbar. Now need to find a way to incorporate custom biomes

PERFECT, FAR & KAC mods are doing just fine in the toolbar. Now need to find a way to incorporate custom biomes

glad to hear, custom biomes same thing delete just the DLL nothing else
